markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Fungus Leshy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3081)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Fungus leshies guard caves, bogs, and damp, dark places. Their fungus gardens are bizarre by most standards, but fungus leshies are extremely proud of their works.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fungus](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Fungus_Leshy.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Fungus Leshy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3081)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fungus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=614" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=639" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 217 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1681) (fungi only)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

**Verdant Burst** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509)) When a fungus leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from their body, restoring 2d8 Hit Points to each [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=614) creature in a 30-foot emanation. This area is filled with fungi, becoming [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). If the terrain is not a viable environment for these plants, they wither after 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spore pod +10 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus spores

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Constant (3rd)**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) (fungi only)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The fungus leshy transforms into a Small giant mushroom or patch of fungi. This ability otherwise uses the effects of [_one with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618).

**Spore Cloud** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A fungus leshy can unleash a cloud of spores that irritates the eyes and throats of non-fungus creatures in a 15-foot emanation. Each creature must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or take 1 [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). A creature has its vision reduced as long as the persistent damage continues and can see only within 20 feet.

**Spores**   A creature that takes damage from a fungus leshy's spore pod Strike must attempt a saving throw with the same DC and effect as its Spore Cloud ability.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-437" />
name: Fungus Leshy
